solution_line_template: 1 bar of soap will last for {months_per_bar} months and there are {months_per_year} months in 1 year so she needs {months_per_year}/{months_per_bar} = {num_bars_needed} bars of soap
Each bar of soap is ${cost_per_bar} and she needs {num_bars_needed} bars so that's a total of {cost_per_bar}*{num_bars_needed} = $<<{cost_per_bar}*{num_bars_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
